name: Droplets (ItchyMaxi, Y4Wee, Wounded)
description:
Avoid Droplets while dealing with ever-changing game mechanics

Made for 2022 SURVIVE Game Jam

Thanks to Y4Wee for audio and Wounded for Art

Controls:

Right-Click: Toggle on/off moving. Player follows your cursor

Q: Issue Chase Command to your Allies. Allies will chase down Droplets

E: Issue Follow Command to your Allies. Allies will follow you.

Instructions:

Droplets will spawn in and chase you down. They damage you on contact, take too many hits and you will lose. Allies can eat the droplets for you, use your Allies to protect yourself. Allies will also drop food for you when they get big enough, along with splitting and spawning another ally.

Achieve the listed Goal to win the game!
